name: Crazy Zombies Road Rash
description:
"Crazy Zombies Road Rash" Fight evil in the dark crazy city and Survive the incoming waves of invading zombies.
Drive crazy and kill zombies to survive in zombies world of Crazy Zombies Road Rash.

In crazy zombies road rash your mission is drive car crazy and shot zombies with bone-crushing weapons and take on the undead .Kill zombies with unique skills, strength, power, attacks.
Drive your car and shoot /hit maximum zombies in Crazy Zombies Road Rash.
Are you ready to unleash your match-winning strategy and save your homeland with defense in Crazy Zombies Road Rash.

Crazy Zombies Road Rash action game that blends the boundaries of classic shooter games and timeless racing games. The rules are very simple - slay the endless waves of zombies or have your brain eaten.

Keep your defense up and kill zombies in one of the best first-person shooters, DEAD TARGET. Can you figure out the key to survival? Play Crazy Zombies Road Rash.

Be careful, the walking dead await a hero, while human survivors may face a big exodus to find safety. Survival is now in your hands.

The Stupid Zombies have risen again, and our heroes are on the move!
Drop some mad geometry and score huge combos with crazy bank shots! "Crazy Zombies Road Rash"

The undead return in this new, jam-packed release with exciting, brainless creatures, weapons, puzzles, moody environments all wrapped up in a slick, player-friendly package. They say you can’t kill what is already dead, but it can’t hurt to make a splash by shooting in their general direction.

Save citizens from stupid monster zombies .Enjoy Hitting Zombies in crazy zombie road rash game.

Choose from different weapons.use your strong armor to withstand piercing damage.You just need to pull the dead trigger to kill them.

Start Journey through awesome levels and defeat mighty zombies to become the ultimate champion.

How to Play:

- Tilt the device left and right to steer the car into debris to kill the Zombies when they catch your car.
- Tap on the screen to shoot the Zombies
- Kill/Smash the Zombies and unlock more powerful Cars and Guns.

Crazy Zombies Road Rash game you reach to your destination and classic shooter
